div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1935 Bernalda (anc. Metapontum), Luca- nia, 1940 Burial: 325-300 B.C. Contents: 33+ AE Metapontum: (13+ obv. Hermes as SNG- Oxford 805; 13+ obv. Demeter as SNGOxford 806; 7+ similar but obv. Nike) Disposition: Metaponto 33 Lo Porto, NSc 1966, pp. 184-5, illus.
